original_text: Now the sons of Saul were Jonathan, and Ishui, and Melchishua: and the names of his two daughters were these; the name of the firstborn Merab, and the name of the younger Michal:
korean_text: 사울의 아들은 요나단과 이스위와 말기수아요 그의 두 딸의 이름은 이러하니 맏딸의 이름은 메랍이요 작은 딸의 이름은 미갈이며

sentences.original_text: Now the sons of Saul were Jonathan
and the names of his two daughters were these;
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 두 딸의 이름은 다음과 같았으며

sentences.original_text: the name of the firstborn Merab
and the name of the younger Michal:
